Description: Copycat is an open-source browser extension-based red team toolkit by SquareX Labs that simulates web-based identity attacks through minimal permissions. It demonstrates how browser extensions can silently hijack authenticated sessions, steal credentials via login page spoofing, intercept OTP/2FA tokens, manipulate OAuth flows, and extract autofill data from enterprise applications. Includes 10 distinct attack modules for testing browser-based identity defenses.
